00019 #define _NBLIST_H

00021 #include "beadlist.h"

00024 #include "exclusionlist.h"

00026 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00027 using namespace votca::tools;
00028 
00038 class NBList 
00039     : public PairList<Bead*, BeadPair>
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     NBList();
00043     virtual ~NBList();    
00044 
00046     virtual void Generate(BeadList &list1, BeadList &list2, bool do_exclusions = true);
00048     virtual void Generate(BeadList &list, bool do_exclusions = true) { Generate(list, list, do_exclusions); }
00049     
00051     void setCutoff(double cutoff) { _cutoff = cutoff; }
00053     double getCutoff() { return _cutoff; }
00054 
00069     template<typename T>
00070     void SetMatchFunction(T *object, bool (T::*fkt)(Bead *, Bead *, const vec &));
00071 
00073     void SetMatchFunction(bool (*fkt)(Bead *, Bead *, const vec &));
00074 
00076     static bool match_always(Bead *b1, Bead *b2, const vec &r) { return true; }
00077 
00079     template<typename pair_type>
00080     void setPairType();
00081 
00082 protected:
00084     double _cutoff;
00086     bool _do_exclusions;
00087 
00089     template<typename pair_type>
00090     static BeadPair *beadpair_create_policy(Bead *bead1, Bead *bead2, const vec &r)
00091     {
00092         return dynamic_cast<BeadPair*>(new pair_type(bead1, bead2, r));
00093     }
00094 
00095     typedef BeadPair* (*pair_creator_t)(Bead *bead1, Bead *bead2, const vec &r);
00097     pair_creator_t _pair_creator;
00098 
00099 
00100 protected:
00102     class Functor {
00103     public:
00104         Functor() {}
00105         virtual bool operator()(Bead *, Bead *, const vec &) = 0;
00106     };
00107 
00109     template<typename T>
00110     class FunctorMember : public Functor {
00111     public:
00112         typedef bool (T::*fkt_t)(Bead *, Bead *, const vec &);
00113 
00114         FunctorMember(T* cls, fkt_t fkt) : _cls(cls), _fkt(fkt) {}
00115 
00116         bool operator()(Bead *b1, Bead *b2, const vec &r) {
00117             return (_cls->*_fkt)(b1, b2, r);
00118         }
00119 
00120     private:
00121         T* _cls;
00122         fkt_t _fkt;
00123     };
00124 
00126     class FunctorNonMember : public Functor {
00127     public:
00128         typedef bool (*fkt_t)(Bead *, Bead *, const vec &);
00129         FunctorNonMember(fkt_t fkt) : _fkt(fkt) {}
00130 
00131         bool operator()(Bead *b1, Bead *b2, const vec &r) {
00132             return (*_fkt)(b1, b2, r);
00133         }
00134 
00135     private:
00136         fkt_t _fkt;
00137     };
00138 
00139     Functor * _match_function;
00140 
00141 };
00142 
00143 template<typename pair_type>
00144 void NBList::setPairType()
00145 {
00146     _pair_creator = NBList::beadpair_create_policy<pair_type>;
00147 }
00148 
00149 template<typename T>
00150 inline void NBList::SetMatchFunction(T *object, bool (T::*fkt)(Bead *, Bead *, const vec &))
00151 {
00152     if(_match_function)
00153         delete _match_function;
00154     _match_function = dynamic_cast<Functor*>(new FunctorMember<T>(object, fkt));
00155 }
00156 
00157 inline void NBList::SetMatchFunction(bool (*fkt)(Bead *, Bead *, const vec &))
00158 {
00159     if(_match_function)
00160         delete _match_function;
00161     _match_function = dynamic_cast<Functor*>(new FunctorNonMember(fkt));
00162 }
00163 
00164 }}

00166 #endif  /* _NBLIST_H */
